element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm adds a new alphanumerical field to the attribute table associated with a vector layer. Supported field types are integer, double and string.

element.name: INPUT
element.text: The input vector layer to which we want to add the field

element.name: FIELD_NAME
element.text: The name of the new field (max 10 characters)

element.name: FIELD_TYPE
element.text: The type of the new field (integer, double or string)

element.name: FIELD_LENGTH
element.text: The length of the new field

element.name: FIELD_PRECISION
element.text: The precision of the new field (double only)

element.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
element.text: The default value of the new field

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The output vector layer with the new field
